subject: Order #SSN2858: wrong item.
description_text:
Hello Simson Team,
I received my order #SSN2858 today.

Unfortunately, when unpacking the box, I noticed that it’s the wrong item. I received the Simson Pro X with two pedals and with out the baseplate(see the picture), but I ordered the Newest Simsonn Pedal Pro X Ultra-PH2-H2 with Haptics and RGB Feedback and with baseplate.
Was this the wrong delivery?
Thank you in advance. 
Goodbye, 
Kamil Schütz 
Yahoo Mail: Suchen, organisieren, erobern

conversations.body_text: Hi kasch147,    Our Pro X Ultra baseplate are currently out of stock at our German warehouse. Therefore, we have shipped the pedals to you first and will resend the baseplate once inventory is replenished in a couple of days. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

Hi Simsonn Team,
ok, thank you. 
Just to confirm, will the replacement baseplate come with haptics like the Nevest Ultra X version?
Best regards
Kamil

Yahoo Mail: Suchen, organisieren, erobern 
 
  Am Do., Okt. 9, 2025 at 13:39 schrieb service@simsonn.com
Hi kasch147,    Thank you for your understanding. They will be shipped separately. Here is your Haptics logistics link:  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6045959981227
